amendment.description: Amendment repeals the National Sheep Industry Improvement Center.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 49 printed in Part B of House Report 113-117 to repeal the National Sheep Industry Improvement Center.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Radel amendment (A043) Agreed to by recorded vote: 235 - 192 (Roll no. 279).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
